Name: Acid Burst
Description: When this character takes damage, all adjacent foes take 1 piercing damage. Increase this damage to 2 piercing against poisoned characters. This effect can trigger any number of times a round.

Name: Acid Splash
Description: Attacks deal 1 piercing damage on hit or miss to all foes in range 2 of the target as an area effect.

Actions.Name: Acrobatics
Actions.Description: Dash 2. This action can interrupt and split up other actions or movement.

Name: Aerial Acrobat
Description: If an attack misses the [name], they may deal 2 damage to the attacker, then fly 2.

Name: Aetherflesh
Description: The [name] can teleport 5 instead of taking a standard move.

Name: Aetherskin
Description: When bloodied, becomes intangible until the end of its next turn.

Name: Aetherwall
Description: Gains resistance against all abilities from characters that are outside of range 2 from them (Resistance halves damage).

Name: All Terrain Vehicle
Description: Unaffected by terrain and height movement penalties.

Name: Amorous Waltz
Description: Immune to all damage from pacified foes.

Name: Amorphous
Description: Can share space with other characters. Any characters that start their turn inside its space take [fray] damage.

Name: Arkentech Bike
Description: The [name] ignores difficult terrain. It can only move in straight lines, but has phasing. Any character it passes through takes 2 damage, but no more than once a turn.

Name: Armor [X]
Description: Reduce all damage taken by [X].

Name: Aura of Bloodlust
Description: Aura 1. Foes that end their turn in the Aura must save or gain hatred of this character.

Name: Aura of Distortion
Description: Aura 1. Allies inside the aura have evasion and foes are blinded+. Becomes aura 2 when bloodied.

Name: Aura of Dread
Description: The [name] has aura 2. Foes inside the aura take +1 curse on saves. Any foe that fails a save inside the area must sacrifice 3.

Name: Aura of Freedom
Description: Aura 1. The [name] and allies in the aura are immune to movement penalties from terrain and elevation.

Name: Aura of Glamour
Description: Aura 2. Foes outside the aura cannot directly target this character with abilities.

Name: Aura of Immortality
Description: While the [name] is undefeated, it has Aura 2. Allies without this trait inside cannot be reduced past 1 HP.

Name: Aura of Resilience
Description: Aura 2. Self and allies in the aura gain +1 boon on saves and are immune to critical hits. (downgrade critical hits to regular hits)

Name: Aura of Rot
Description: Aura 2. Foes that start or end their turn in the aura lose all vigor, then take 2 piercing damage.

Name: Aura of Shielding
Description: Aura 1. Self and allies in the area have dodge.

Name: Aura of Terror
Description: Aura 1. Foes that end their turn in the aura must save or become pacified and shoved 1.

Name: Automata
Description: If the [name] attacks the same character as last turn, it deals bonus damage and gains +1 boon. This effect stacks.

Name: Battle Platform
Description: Characters can mount or dismount the [name] by spending 1 space of movement, placing them adjacent when dismounting, with the following rules:

ListedItems.Description: Allies can start the battle mounted on the [name].

While mounted, place characters inside a free space in the [name] (so the [name] has space for 4 size 1 characters). They share its space, move when it moves, and have cover. While moving with the [name], characters are unstoppable.
Characters hostile to the [name] must pass a save to mount it.
Characters mounting it the [name] when it is defeated are placed in any free adjacent space of the [name]'s choice and take 3 damage.

Name: Blight Splash
Description: Attacks deal 1 piercing damage on hit or miss to all foes in range 2 of the target as an area effect.

Name: Blood Hunger
Description: Deals +2 damage with all abilities against bloodied foes.

Name: Blood Price
Description: The [name] has Aura 2:

ListedItems.Description: Foes inside the aura that use an ability must sacrifice 2 after the ability resolves.
Whenever a character in the area sacrifices, the [name] may grant 2 vigor to itself or any ally in the aura.

Name: Blood Rush
Description: May rush 2 before making any attack. If the attack triggers exceed, may rush 2 again.

Name: Blood Scent
Description: Always focuses on the closest bloody foe.

Name: Bloodwhetter
Description: When this character is damaged by an ability they may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe. This happens each time this character is damaged.

Name: Boiling Shroud
Description: While bloodied, the [name] has permanent stealth and gains aura 1. All other characters inside the aura are blinded+ while inside.

Name: Brace
Description: When adjacent to an object, increase the range of all abilities with a listed range by +4.

Name: Bullheaded
Description: Has resistance unless suffering from a status.

Name: Camouflage
Description: If this [name] ends its turn adjacent to an object or or inside difficult or dangerous terrain, it gains stealth.

Name: Cheap Trick
Description: When missed by an attack, may deal 1 damage to their attacker, then teleport 1.

Name: Commander's Aura
Description: Aura 2. Allies in the aura have +1 boon on attacks.

Name: Cornered
Description: When half its members are remaining or less, this [name] gains +1 action.

Name: Counter
Description: Each time a foe deals damage to you with an ability, deal 2 damage back.

Name: Cowardly by Nature
Description: The [name] surrenders and ends the fight if it's the only character left.

Name: Cronies
Description: This character starts combat with 5 mob allies, regardless of encounter budget.

Name: Crumbling Body
Description: Each time it would take damage from an action or ability, permanently reduce its armor by 1 for the rest of combat, even if that damage is reduced to 0. If it's armor is 0, it becomes vulnerable+.

Name: Crystal Dagger
Description: When the demon teleports, it may deal 1 damage to a foe in range 3.

Name: Curl Up
Description: When defeated, this character curls up and becomes a height 1 boulder object.

Name: Curse the Eyeless
Description: Evasion against blinded or slowed characters. (Roll a d6 when targeted by an attack. On a 4+, the attack automatically misses. Check before the attack roll)

Name: Dark Hollow
Description: Deals bonus damage and has evasion unless there's two or more adjacent characters.

Name: Death Whistle
Description: When this character attacks, other characters in range 2 of it must save or lose any stances they are holding.

Name: Defiance
Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.

Name: Deflate
Description: If the [name] is prevented from flying, it becomes immobile until it can fly again.

Name: Dig
Description: Can phase through terrain and characters.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 is cured.

Name: Dirty Fighting
Description: +1 boon on attacks and bonus damage to characters inside pits.

Name: Divine Presence
Description: Immune to stun.

Name: Dodge
Description: Immune to damage from missed attacks, area effects, and successful saves.

Name: Duty of Death
Description: Adjacent allies to this character without this trait have dodge.

Name: Dweller in Dark
Description: The [name] has the following abilities:

ListedItems.Description: May use its standard move to teleport from the area of any pit to any other pit in range 4.
Has resistance while inside a pit.

Name: Ear Splitting Song
Description: The [name] has aura 2. Foes in the aura gain +1 curse on saves and do not save against statuses at the end of their turn. The aura increases to aura 3 when the [name] is bloodied.

Name: Earth Bond
Description: Resistance when adjacent to an object or inside a pit.

Name: Earthbreaker
Description: This character can phase through objects and destroys any objects it moves through this way. Objects that can't normally be destroyed are instead removed as if they were unsummoned.

Name: Elite
Description: Takes 2 turns.

Name: Empty Husk
Description: This character becomes a height 1 object when defeated instead of a character, and cannot be returned to the battlefield.

Name: Enrage
Description: +1 action when bloodied.

Name: Entrench
Description: Unstoppable while inside a pit. (Immune to all statuses. Can't be immobilized, shoved, or teleported by foes)

Name: Equivalent Exchange
Description: Aura 1. Once a round, when an ally in the Aura is defeated, deal divine damage to any foe on the battlefield equal to 25% of their max hp.

Name: Eternal Rage
Description: When defeated, instead remain at 1 hp and become intangible until the end of their next turn. At the end of that turn, become defeated.

Name: Ethereal
Description: Phasing, and has resistance unless adjacent to a foe.

Name: Evasion
Description: Roll a d6 when targeted by an attack. On a 4+, the attack automatically misses. Check before the attack roll.

Name: Explosive Demise
Description: When defeated, explodes in a small blast area effect centered on it. Characters inside are shoved 1 away from the origin space and must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] on a successful save.

Name: Eyeless
Description: Immune to blinded.

Name: Flip Over
Description: When taking damage more than its armor total, loses all armor, becomes stunned, and all attacks against it are critical hits. These effects last until the end of its next turn.

Name: Flying
Description: Ignores terrain damage and movement penalties, height movement penalties, obstruction, and engagement.

Name: Forced March
Description: At the start of their turn, the [name] and all allies may dash 1 in the same direction.

Name: Fortify
Description: At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1.

Name: Frenzy
Description: When hitting with an attack, immediately gain +1 action.

Name: Gran Diaga
Description: Aura 2. At the start of the [name]'s turn, all allies in the aura gain vigor 3.

Name: Great Enrage
Description: Sturdy and +1 action while bloodied. (Can't be stunned or dazed, and reduce the distance of all shoves by 1)

Name: Greenwalker
Description: Immune to difficult terrain.

Name: Grit
Description: Sturdy when bloodied. (Can't be stunned or dazed, and reduce the distance of all shoves by 1)

Name: Guard
Description: Has Rampart, Reduce all damage to self and allies in orthogonal spaces by 2, as if by armor.

Name: Heavy Arkentech Armor
Description: The [name] is fitted with heavy power armor that is only strong from the front, with the following effects:

ListedItems.Description: They cannot dash, fly, or teleport.
They can be used for cover by allies as if a height 1 object.

At the end of the [name]'s turn, decide which character they are facing towards. They become resistant to all damage from that character and unstoppable against any of their abilities. It can instead choose to grant these benefits to an adjacent ally. It must choose a different character each turn from the last.

Name: Heavy Armor
Description: Resistant to abilities used from adjacent spaces.

Name: Heavy Caliber
Description: The [name]'s abilities have Collide: [fray] damage and foe is slashed.

Name: Heavy Metal Shield
Description: Has resistance against abilities from the closest foe. If multiple foes are equidistant, this trait applies to all of them. (Take 1/2 damage, rounded up)

Name: Hellforged
Description: Immune to difficult and dangerous terrain.

Name: Hold the Line
Description: If the [name] ends any turn without attacking, they gain Sturdy and Vigilance +1.

Name: Hollow
Description: Aura 1. While there is exactly 1 other character in hollow's aura, it has have evasion and stealth. This aura has no effect if no other characters, or 2 or more other characters are inside, and its effects (including stealth) turn off it if deactivates.

Name: Hovering
Description: Immune to rampart.

Name: Immobile
Description: Can't move, be moved, or be removed from the battlefield in any way.

Name: Immortal Disregard
Description: Attacks never miss the [name] (turn any miss into a hit).

Name: Immovable Object
Description: Cannot be shoved, teleported, or removed from the battlefield.

Name: Insulated
Description: Immune to damage from terrain and terrain effects.

Name: Isolation
Description: Has resistance to damage dealt by characters with no allies adjacent. (Take 1/2 damage, rounded up)

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: At the start of the round, this character may clear a status or mark.

Name: Latch
Description: Starts combat sharing the same space as another ally the same size or larger. While latched on, can't move, but instead moves with its host. Being moved out of its host's space end this effect. If the [name] would be shoved, teleported, or removed from the battlefield, it can pass a save to avoid the effect and become immune to these effects until the end of the current turn. Can latch on to a new adjacent allied character with 1 action or its standard move ability.

Name: Lead Astray
Description: Aura 2. This character may teleport any other character that ends their turn in the aura 2 spaces in any direction.

Name: Leap
Description: This [name] ignores height movement penalties. When it ends any movement on a lower elevation than it started, it gains flying for the duration of that movement.

Name: Legend
Description: Takes 1 turn for each player character.

Name: Living Lightning
Description: Electrifies foes it moves through. Foes that are already electrified must save or become slowed. Allied spaces cost 0 movement to pass through.

Name: Living Root
Description: When defeated, becomes a height 2 object.

Name: Living Statue
Description: Cannot dash. When defeated, becomes a height 2 piece of terrain.

Name: Lone Wolf
Description: When ending their turn with no foes or allies in range 2, gains stealth.

Name: Long Legs
Description: Ignores all obstruction and terrain movement penalties.

Name: Low Profile
Description: Has evasion against ranged attacks.

Name: Lucky Feather
Description: When taking damage that would reduce this character to 0 hp, roll 1d6. On a 3+, become immune to all damage from the triggering ability. True strike bypasses this effect.

Name: Lumbering
Description: Cannot dash. Only takes slow turns.

Name: Martyrdom
Description: When defeated, cures all allies in range 2.

Name: Master of Gun
Description: Has counter against all abilities used from a range of 3 or greater. Damage from counter ignores cover.

Name: Master of Strategy
Description: Before combat starts, may move every character to any space up to 2 spaces in any direction from their starting location.

Name: Mob
Description: This character doesn't trigger slay effects, and is removed when defeated.

Name: Monster Riding
Description: The [name] starts combat riding a trained monster, and can also mount it as an action or by spending its standard move. While riding, the [name] shares space with the monster and moves when it moves, becoming unstoppable while moving this way. If the two are separated, this effect ends until the monster is remounted.

Summons.Name: Tame Monster
Summons.SummonActions: During the [name]'s turn, can dash 4, then either shove a character 1 space or deal 2 damage to them.

Name: Nimble
Description: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

Name: Noxious Censer
Description: The priest has Aura 2. Poisoned foes in the aura get +1 curse on attacks and saves.

Name: Overwhelming Stench
Description: Aura 1. Attackers in the aura gain +1 curse on attacks, and any character that ends their turn in the aura must save or become slow and poisoned. Poisoned characters treat the area as dangerous terrain.

Name: Pack Tactics
Description: Gains +1 boon on attacks if an ally is adjacent to their target.

Name: Pack Tactics (Improved)
Description: Gains +1 boon on attacks if an ally is adjacent to their target and bonus damage for every ally adjacent to their target.

Name: Painwrack
Description: Characters that collide with this character take [fray] damage.

Name: Partner Work
Description: Aura 2. When this character dashes, an ally in the aura may also dash 1.

Name: Phase Slip
Description: After being damaged for the first time on any turn, become intangible until the start of the following turn.

Name: Phasing
Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain, objects, or characters.

Name: Pixie Dust
Description: Aura 2. Allies that start their turn in the aura gain flying until the end of their turn.

Name: Primal Strength
Description: All the [name]'s abilities have Collide: foes are is weakened. Weakened foes take 2 damage on collide instead, and the [name] gains 2 vigor.

Name: Rampart
Description: Foes cannot enter or exit a space affected by a rampart effect by dashing, flying, or teleporting.

Name: Rancor
Description: Foes that end their turn adjacent to the [name] take 3 damage and are slashed.

Name: Ranged Master
Description: Ignores ranged attack penalties for adjacent foes.

Name: Regeneration
Description: If bloodied, gain 4 vigor at the end of your turn.

Name: Regenerator
Description: Starts combat with vigor 1 and Regeneration. Starts combat bloodied. (Gain vigor 1 as the end of their turn).

Name: Resistance
Description: Take 1/2 damage, rounded up.

Name: Rook
Description: Grants cover to adjacent allies.

Name: Saddle Up
Description: An adjacent ally can mount or dismount this character as a free action, entering and sharing its space. Whiled mounted, attacks take +1 curse against a rider. Allies can start any combat already riding this character. This character has room for two size 1 characters. If this character is defeated, characters dismount.

Name: Salty
Description: When the Sailor sacrifices any amount, they gain 3 vigor after the triggering ability resolves.

Name: Shaggy Mass
Description: The [name] blocks line of sight and provides cover as though it was a height 3 object.

Name: Shambling
Description: Cannot dash.

Name: Shed Flesh
Description: After taking damage that bloodies it, becomes intangible until the start of its next turn as it wriggles out of its flesh. For the rest of combat, gains phasing and flying.

Name: Shelter
Description: +1 boon on saves.

Name: Size [X]
Description: This character takes up a [X] by [X] area of spaces.

Name: Skirmisher
Description: Can move diagonally, and dash moves full speed.

Name: Slam
Description: When a character collides from the [name]'s moves, they are slashed. Slashed characters take [fray] damage instead.

Name: Slime Trail
Description: Aura 1. Any foe that starts their turn in the aura slips and is shoved 2. Collide: Foe takes [fray] damage.

Name: Slimy Skin
Description: When damaged, may dash 1 as an effect.

Name: Slip
Description: Movement ignores rampart, interrupts, and vigilance.

Name: Slippery
Description: Has evasion while bloodied.

Name: Sneak
Description: While in stealth, has evasion and phasing.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description: Attacks that break Stealth deal bonus damage and can critical hit (+[D]).

Name: Soul Mass
Description: Can share space with other characters. Foes treat the space as difficult terrain, are slashed+ while inside, and have cover from the outside, but are otherwise targetable normally. Any foes that start their turn inside its space take [fray] damage. Foes that attempt to leave the [name]'s space by any means on their turn must save or become unable to exit it until the end of the current turn.

Name: Spindly Limbs
Description: Ignores engagement from other character, and spends no additional movement moving up or down terrain.

Name: Spirit Shift
Description: This character is intangible and gains phasing while moving.

Name: Spiritfeed
Description: All this character's abilities gain slay: gain +1 action.

Name: Stench
Description: The [name] has aura 1. Foes in the aura take +1 curse on attacks and saves.

Name: Stone Pantry
Description: Has evasion while adjacent to an object. In addition, if the [name] ends its turn adjacent to an object, it gains stealth.

Name: Stoneskin
Description: While adjacent to an object, has resistance.

Name: Street Fighter
Description: Has resistance while adjacent to two or more foes.

Name: Strength
Description: This character's abilities have Collide: [fray] damage and foe is dazed. Dazed foes take [D]+[fray] instead.

Name: Sturdy
Description: When moved or removed and placed by a foe, can only be moved max 1 space a turn.

Name: Stutter
Description: Once a turn, after a foe takes an action in range 2, this character may teleport 1 and deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Name: Summon
Description: Natals disappear when reduced to 0 hp and don't cause engagement.

Name: Surreality
Description: When this character would be defeated, instead becomes intangible until the end of its next turn, then removes itself from the battlefield. It cannot return.

Name: Swarm
Description: Has resistance to any damage not from area effects or attacks. Does not provide obstruction, but characters treat its space as difficult terrain. (Take 1/2 damage, rounded up)

Name: Swarm Shroud
Description: Aura 2. Ranged attacks against this character and allies in the aura gain +1 curse, and foes that start their turn in the aura take 1 piercing damage.

Name: Tactics Aura
Description: Aura 1. Allies ignore engagement and rampart effects while in the aura, and may dash 1 if they start their turn there.

Name: Terrain Expert
Description: Ignores movement, damage, and attack penalties from all kinds of terrain.

Name: Terrainwalking
Description: Ignores movement penalties for height and terrain.

Name: The Old Blood
Description: Immune to blights.

Name: Time Lock
Description: After taking damage, this character becomes intangible until the start of the following turn.

Name: True Enrage
Description: Unstoppable and +1 action while bloodied. (Immune to all statuses. Can't be immobilized, shoved, or teleported by foes)

Name: Tumbling
Description: Moving up terrain costs no movement. Can phase through characters and doing so costs a maximum of 1 movement.

Name: Tunnel
Description: When this character ends its turn, create a pit underneath it.

Name: Two Heads
Description: Saves at the start and the end of its turn to end conditions or other effects.

Name: Unflattering Bounty Poster
Description: The [name] starts combat by unveiling an unflattering poster of bounty target, chosen randomly from all player characters. The [name]'s has evasion against that character and their abilities are stronger against them.

Name: Unstable
Description: When defeated, explodes in a large blast area effect explosion centered on the [name]. Characters inside take piercing fray damage, twice, as an area effect. The [name] is then removed from the battlefield. Create a pit in the area it vacated.

Name: Unstoppable
Description: Immune to all statuses. Can't be immobilized, shoved, or teleported by foes.

Name: Vantage Point
Description: Characters mounted on the [name] ignore height disadvantage, have +1 boon on attacks and increase the range of all their abilities with a listed range by +4.

Name: Vengeance
Description: When bloodied, next attack becomes a critical hit on hit (+[D]).

Name: Venom Blade
Description: Attacks inflict poisoned, ignore vigor, and deal bonus damage against bloodied characters.

Name: Wayfinding
Description: Has evasion while inside difficult or dangerous terrain, and ignores the effects of difficult or dangerous terrain.

Name: Zipline Dismount
Description: Characters mounted on this character can fly 5 and dismount it as free action.
